mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(payment_id, buyer, beneficiary, product_type, feed_id, payment_option, select_price, last_price, payment_date, is_withdraw, is_cancel) VALUE (#{paymentId}, #{buyer.userCode}, #{beneficiary:VARCHAR}, #{productType:NUMERIC}, #{feedId:NUMERIC}, #{paymentOption:NUMERIC}, #{selectPrice:NUMERIC}, #{lastPrice:NUMERIC}, NOW(), #{isWithdraw:NUMERIC}, #{isCancel:NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(select_Price) FROM payment WHERE beneficiary = #{value} AND is_cancel=0 AND is_withdraw=0 AND product_Type=2 GROUP BY beneficiary
